description: Instant Pot Tomato Soup with Cornmeal Crusted Tofu Croutons. Easy 1 Pot Vegan Tomato Soup with Crispy Croutons. Use any croutons and spices of choice. Vegan Gluten-free Recipe. can be nut-free.
name: Instant Pot Tomato Soup
recipeIngredient: 7 oz tofu (pressed for 10 minutes and cubed)
1 tablespoon fine cornmeal (, or use rice flour or breadcrumbs as sub)
1/2 tsp fresh dill or 1/4 tsp dried
1/4 teaspoon each onion powder ( and garlic powder)
3/4 cup cashew milk or thick full fat coconut milk (, 1/2 to 3/4 cup based on preference)
Black pepper for garnish (, sugar/sweetener for flavor (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Tofu Croutons: Combine all the herbs, spices in a bowl. Add tofu cubes and toss to coat. Spread on parchment lined baking sheet. Spray oil (optional). Bake at 400 degrees F for 15 to 20 mins (depends on your preference of crispy, chewyness).
Soup: Blend carrots, tomato paste diced tomatoes and water into a smooth purÃ©e.
Put the Instant Pot on SautÃ©. Add oil. When the oil is hot, add onion and garlic, cook for two minutes stirring frequently. Deglaze with some water if needed.
Add the herbs, salt, onion and garlic powder, and pepper flakes and mix in. Add the blended tomato mixture and mix in.
Close the Instant Pot and pressure cook for five minutes. Let the pressure release naturally or Quick release after 10 minutes.
Add in the cashew milk and black pepper if using. Bring to a boil on saute. Taste and adjust salt, herbs, tang with lemon. Add some sweetener if needed.
Serve with the crispy tofu croutons. Add a drizzle of cashew milk/cream and some fresh basil or dill for garnish (optional).

video.description:
Instant Pot Tomato Soup with Cornmeal Crusted Tofu Croutons. Saucepan Option.
ðŸ’™ðŸ§¡FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2018/03/instant-pot-tomato-soup-tofu-croutons.html
ðŸ’™ðŸ§¡MY COOKBOOK: https://veganricha.com/vrekaz

This soup is Gorgeous, delicious and super easy. Just blend up the ingredients, pour into the instant pot with some herbs, pressure cook for five minutes and you are done. I top the soup with crispy tofu croutons that work wonderfully. 

Oregano, dill and basil add the flavor. Cashew or Coconut milk add creamyness. The soup can easily be made without tofu with other croutons (bread croutons, roasted chickpeas etc), without nuts with coconut milk and oil free by sauteing in broth. Try this delicious soup with Extra black pepper for the chilly days. The soup can also be easily made in a saucepan, see recipe notes. For variation, change up the herbs, add some red lentils (1/4 cup) with the tomato mix for a hearty soup. Build it up to make your own!
More Instant Pot Recipes: http://veganricha.com/category/instant-pot
